version_description: Apple Pay تلبية لرغبة عملاء ساب قمنا بإضافة خدمة الدفع عن طريق

Apple Pay تلبية لرغبة عملاء ساب قمنا بإضافة خدمة الدفع عن طريق

Now you can add your Mada and credit card to ApplePay Wallet through SABBMobile to make your purchase.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! this release brings:

•Performance improvement
•New Services & Features
•Retrieve username
•View Credit Card authorized transactions
•Donation transfers
•View composite statement
•General Enhancements


شكراً لإستخدامكم ساب موبايل! هذا الإصدار يقدم:

• تحسين الأداء
• خدمات ومميزات جديدة
• إستعادة اسم المستخدم
• عرض التفاويض المعلقة للبطاقة الإئتمانية
• تحويل التبرعات
• كشف الحساب الإلكتروني للحسابات المركبة
• تحسينات عامة

- Bug Fixes and Improvements
- Biometric Fix
- تحسينات عامة
- حل مشكلة الدخول بالبصمة

•Performance improvement
•General Enhancements


شكراً لإستخدامكم ساب موبايل! هذا الإصدار يقدم:

•تحسين الأداء
•تحسينات عامة

Thank you for using SABBMobile! this release offers:

•Performance improvement.
•An easier way to manage and pay SADAD bills.
•Based on your preference now you can customize accounts in Dashboard.
•General Enhancements.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This update offers:

1- Introducing IPO subscription and subscription history
2- General enhancements and bug fixing

1- Improving the navigation between the application services

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This update offers:

1- Apply and activate Umlaty card.
2- View Umlaty card details and transactions.
3- Manage Umlaty card.
4- View Standing Instructions.
5- Manage Standing Instructions.
6- International transfers improvements.
7- Add\Delete dependents for IPO subscriptions.
8- General enhancements.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This release offers:
1- Updating Customer Profile (Email, Personal details , Residential and Mailing Address).
2- Open New account (Saving Account, Current Account).
3- Create Waafer Account (to start your savings plan).
4- Create Islamic Commodity Investment Account.
5- Auto Logout
6- Autofill ID for MOI services
7- Enhance password reset option
8- Renew Customer ID without need to visit the branch.
9- Availing National Platform for Violations
10- General enhancements based on your feedback.

4- General enhancements based on your feedback.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This release offers:
• SABB AQSAT
- Now you can convert your Credit Card applicable transactions into monthly instalment.
- View your current AQSAT plans.
- View your AQSAT plans history.
- Cancel active AQSAT plans.
• Supplementary Credit Card
- Request a new supplementary Credit Card for your family members.
- Change the supplementary Card limit.
- Reset your supplementary Card remaining limit.
- Managing the supplementary Card such as, Activate, Change PIN, Stop card, temporary stopping the card, and more.
• Account information
- View your account information details such as, IBAN Number and Account number.
- View your relationship manager name.
- View your relationship manager contact numbers.
- Share your account details information.
• General enhancements based on your feedback.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This release offers:
- General enhancements based on your feedback.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This release offers:
- The ability to raise your complaints and follow up with their status directly through SABBMobile application.
- Through raising complaints feature, you will be able to raise more than 15 types of complaints such as:
· Inquiring about your international transfers
· Raising disputes
· Raising claims
· And many other types
- General enhancements based on your feedback.

Thank you for using SABBMobile! This release offers:
• Now you can add your Relationship Manager Details to Apple Wallet.
• Add your Account Information to Apple Wallet for a faster reach.
• General enhancements based on your feedback.
